main.name: Rachel Resende
main.description: Creative problem solver with experience in startup environment
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rachel! I am graduated in Advertising from IBMR and I have a specialization in Marketing Management from IBMEC. I am passionate about technology and everything new. I work developing culture of innovation and analytics at Hurb managing education digital products as a Data Ambassador and in my free time I am part of the WTM in Rio de Janeiro, a volunteer community promoted by Google that encourages more women in technology. I have experience mainly with digital commercial operation performance and product marketing, having worked in companies such as Globosat, Globo, Cyberlabs and Stone.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.description: Descomplica is one of the biggest digital educational plataform in Brazil. The        course is focused in fullstack  development.

IBMEC is a Brazilian private university, widely regarded as one of the leading and most prestigious institutions specialized in teaching and research in the fields of Business and Economics in   Latin America.
IBMR is a big Brazilian private university that is part of the Laureate International Group.

work.title: Data Ambassador (ProductManager, Data & Training)
work.description: Hurb (formerly Hotel Urbano) is the largest online travel agency based in Brazil. This position is equivalent to a Product Manager, but with focus on digital educational products of data analytics. I helped founding Hurb's Data School, that is a internal platform that teaches data driven culture for our employees.

work.title: Product Marketing Specialist
work.description: Stone is a leading provider of financial technology solutions that empower merchants and integrated partners to conduct electronic commerce seamlessl across in-store, online, and mobile channels. I worked in Marketing department on management CRM products.

work.title: Product Marketing Manager
work.description: Cyberlabs is a laboratory of technological development formed by the merger of two leaders in their segments: PSafe, an authority on cybersecurity; and CyberLabs, a reference in disruptive AI solutions. My main duties were: be responsible for marketing of an application product (KeyApp) in the Brazilian market, define go-tomarket strategy for KeyApp, set goals, manage releases and implement activations to drive adoption and work with sales team and customer team to identify opportunities

work.title: Digital AdOps Analyst, Finance and Automobilist
work.description: Globo is the largest media group in Brazil and controls the leading broadcast television network and the leading pay-TV programmer in Brazil. I was responsible for the exclusive customer service for advertisers in the financial and automotive sector of Globo's pay channels. Among them: Bradesco, Renault, Pic Pay, Ford, Jeep and Ita√∫. Besides that, I created many dashboards for daily monitoring of campaign results and research to drive insights, sales and brand awareness.
